column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I was visiting Chicago this weekend and had never tried Chicago-style deep dish pizza. A lot of locals recommend Lou Malnati's to us. I
column3: wasn't too impressed with the pizza. We ordered the The Malnati Chicago Classic. We thought the ingredients themselves were fresh and tasted good
column4: but I'm not sure that I'm a fan of deep dish pizza itself.
